page.title: 17SUNDAY
page.content: On Sunday morning because we do not have to rush to work we have a leisurely breakfast and read the Sunday paper. At 10:30 we go to Sunday School, while Dad goes down to our allottment where he grows fresh vegetables. Every other Sunday Dad fetches Grandma for dinner and tea. We have dinner around 1:30pm then, while Mum and Dad wash up, the children play. In the afternoon if it is fine we go a walk round the village but if it is wet we stay in and watch T.V. We have tea around 6:00pm. After tea we all sit down to watch T.V. At about 8:30 the children get ready for bed and Dad takes Grandma home about 9:30pm.{
